titleStmt.title: Spiritual bondage and freedom, or, A treatise containing the substance of several sermons preached on that subject from John VIII, 36 by the late Reverend Mr. Nathanael Ball ...
titleStmt.author: Ball, Nathanael, 1623-1681.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
Various pages on filmed copy dark and partly illegible.
